name: Check for typos and bad grammar
description: Check for typos and bad grammar
test_details:
Check the pages content for any spelling mistakes (typos) or grammatical issues. Highlight the specific problematic text in the summary.
Pass only if free from all errors.

name: Website has reviews
description: Check for presence of reviews in site code
test_details:
Check the site code to analyze for the presence of reviews. Looking for specifically stuff that says like 5/5 stars or 1/5 stars or people reviewing what they think about the product.

Check site scripts loading as well for anything that might be a review app or plugin (like stamped.io, reviews.io, etc.)

name: Check for custom fonts
description: Make sure the site isn't using default fonts
test_details:
Make sure the website isn't using default fonts or overused fonts like:
Copperplate Gothic
Times New Roman
Trajan Pro
Comic Sans
Courier
Papyrus
Bonzai
Neuland-Inline
Brush Script
Souvenir
FF Blur
Impact
Trajan Pro
Curlz
Jokerman
Lobster
Bleeding Cowboys
Arial
Helvetica

name: Page Weight Distribution
description: Check if images or scripts are overrepresented in the page weight.
test_details: Check if images or scripts are overrepresented in the page weight. Fail the test if the page weight distribution is significantly different from the industry standard would would likely result in a slow loading website
